sentences.sContent: a dapper little man in a grey suit
sentences.sCn: 一身灰西装、打扮利落的小个子男人

synos.tran: 短小精悍的；衣冠楚楚的；整洁的；整齐的

trans.tranCn: 短小精悍的；衣冠楚楚的；整洁的；整齐的
trans.tranOther: a man who is dapper is nicely dressed, has a neat appearance, and is usually small or thin

trans.tranCn: (Dapper)人名；(英)达珀；(意)达珀尔；(德)达佩尔
